## MFAContainer.authenticateWithOOB() method

Performs MFA using out-of-band (OOB) MFA authenticator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
authenticateWithOOB(options: AuthenticateWithOOBOptions): Promise<User>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>AuthenticateWithOOBOptions</code> | Authentication options |
